name: OnlyTheBody - Android bodyweight app
tagline: bodyweight, fitness, android app, neila rey
body:
### Bodyweight workouts for power and force.
Inspired by excellent website (http://neilarey.com) - currently (http://darebee.com/).

### Attention!
As it mentioned at (http://darebee.com/terms-of-use.html) "None of the materials from this website, completely or partially, can be used for product development e.g. mobile application development, books or PDF collections, duplicates of this website in English or any other language." So this project not an "mobile application development, books or PDF collections" - its just say my way to study Android programming. You will never see this app on Google Play or any APK store. Trait this code like an tutorial...

### Android images
